function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Using euclidean distance in 2d space for inter-people distance estimation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of camera calibration and intrinsic parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Error in camera height, angle of view, and optics specifications","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close contact with detected humans in public places","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mosaic data augmentation, class label smoothing, and dropblock regularisation in the input part of the detection module","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilization of the simple online and real-time sort tracking technique for people tracking and id assignment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on the hungarian optimization technique for assigning unique id numbers to individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of complex mathematical equations may lead to errors in implementation or understanding","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overfitting may occur due to the use of specific techniques such as dropblock and class label smoothing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorrect interpretation of the loss function and its parameters may lead to suboptimal training outcomes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through contact with the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multi-scale detection techniques may increase computational resource requirements","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient spatial pooling operations may impact the accuracy and efficiency of the model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of selective search and region proposal for two-stage detectors may introduce potential biases in object detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential difficulty in dealing with low-resolution images","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in detecting small objects in images","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of local information during feature extraction process","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of dense models and multiple layers may increase the complexity of the model, making it harder to train","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of extra layers between the backbone and the head neck module may introduce additional complexity and potential points of failure in the model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection of a backbone architecture with a higher number of parameters may lead to increased complexity and resource requirements","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of data augmentation techniques such as mosaic may create a false sense of data variety and lead to overfitting if not used carefully","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Noisy estimation of mean and variance in batch normalization due to batch size reduction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection and evaluation of activation functions may result in suboptimal model performance","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of the system on all types of cctv surveillance cameras","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on large training datasets for people detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inherent limitations of object detection models and algorithms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on accuracy of people detection and inter-people distance estimation in crowds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of standard comparison on common datasets for people detection and distance estimation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"No analytical studies or post-processing to analyze the risk of infection distribution after people detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of statistical analysis provided for the outcome of the distance violation index","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"No statistical assessment on virus spread based on distance measurements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate comparison of dnn models’ accuracy based on non-comparable ground truths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of gps data for monitoring infected individuals may raise privacy concerns and potential misuse of personal data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai and machine learning to monitor public spaces may lead to increased reliance on surveillance and raise ethical concerns about privacy and consent","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing wireless signal-based human detection in public places may lead to ineffectiveness of the technology and reliance on alternative monitoring methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High r0 value for covid-19 estimated at 2-2.5 indicates rapid spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic costs of social distancing for r0<1 and r0≈2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Moderate level of social activities and economic status","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of definite solution for treatment of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective control of virus spread in public places","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in determining and predicting the number of infected and recovered individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Statistical analysis of spatio-temporal data from people movements can reveal high-risk zones for contagious disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extensive testing and assessment in indoor and outdoor datasets may overlook specific contagious disease transmission risks in certain environments or communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Developed model for human detection and tracking may introduce privacy concerns and ethical implications, especially in public spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential misuse of ai-based social distancing monitoring for privacy invasion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for critical health and safety decisions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of technological challenges impacting real-time performance","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of infection spread and constraint efficiency","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on essential tasks and job-related travel","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
